settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.content:
Yes we do... to almost every county in the world!

We love our international customers and even include them in our KĀR Warranty Exchange Program. All we ask is that you pay for all shipping expenses associated with any international warranty exchange.

settings.title: What is the Kapture KĀR Warranty?
settings.content: Our KĀR (pronounced "care") Warranty in an unconditional lifetime warranty on all Kapture parts. Read more here.

settings.title: I don't see my optic model listed.  Can it still be compatible?
settings.content:
Yes. You can check our Optic Sizing Chart to see a full list of Kapture compatible optics.

If you don't see your optic model listed, please contact us. We only list optics that we have physically verified as compatible and just because your optic is not on our list does not mean it isn't compatible.

You can also download our Knekt System Fitment Guide to test your optics compatibility with the Kapture system.

settings.title: I bought the wrong item or size.  What do I do?
settings.content: If you purchased the wrong size or part, you can start a return or exchange through our Return and Exchange Portal. If you have questions prior to initiating your yout claim, please feel free to Contact Us.

settings.title: Any additional questions?
settings.content: You can contact us through our Contact Us page! We will be happy to assist you.
